problem_definition.command_line:
make
../../../bin/icferst cwc_P1DGP1.mpml cp cwc_P1DGP1_1.vtu serial_P1DGP1.vtu mpiexec ../../../bin/icferst cwc_P1DGP1.mpml ../../../bin/pvtu2vtu cwc_P1DGP1 1 ../../../bin/vtudiff serial_P1DGP1.vtu cwc_P1DGP1_1.vtu diff_P1DGP1.vtu
../../../bin/icferst cwc_P1DGP2.mpml cp cwc_P1DGP2_1.vtu serial_P1DGP2.vtu mpiexec ../../../bin/icferst cwc_P1DGP2.mpml ../../../bin/pvtu2vtu cwc_P1DGP2 1 ../../../bin/vtudiff serial_P1DGP2.vtu cwc_P1DGP2_1.vtu diff_P1DGP2.vtu

variables.variable: import vtk import numpy file=vtk.vtkXMLUnstructuredGridReader() file.SetFileName("diff_P1DGP1.vtu") file.Update() data=file.GetOutput() data.GetPointData().SetActiveScalars("Component5::ComponentMassFractionPhase1") d1=numpy.zeros(data.GetNumberOfPoints()) data.GetPointData().GetScalars().ExportToVoidPointer(d1) check_P1DGP1=abs(d1) print max(check_P1DGP1)

import vtk import numpy file=vtk.vtkXMLUnstructuredGridReader() file.SetFileName("diff_P1DGP2.vtu") file.Update() data=file.GetOutput() data.GetPointData().SetActiveScalars("Component5::ComponentMassFractionPhase1") d1=numpy.zeros(data.GetNumberOfPoints()) data.GetPointData().GetScalars().ExportToVoidPointer(d1) check_P1DGP2=abs(d1) print max(check_P1DGP2)
